definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (´[[י]] is righteous; cf. [[חִדְקִיׇּהוּ]] Sab. [[חדקאל]] Hal:193) father of Joshua the high-priest, ´[[יְהוֹ]] Hag 1:1, Hag 1:12, Hag 1:14, Hag 2:2, Hag 2:4; Zec 6:11, 1Ch 6:14, 1Ch 6:15; = ´[[יוֹ]] Ezr 3:2, Ezr 3:8, Ezr 5:2, Ezr 10:18, Ne 12:26 (LXX )Iwsadak, )Iwsedek).
